PHRASE.LANG: kName
Rebel Snowspeeder Pilot Suit
Pilote Snowspeeder Rebelle
Rebellen-Schneegleiterpilot
Pilota Snowspeeder dei Ribelli
Piloto rebelde del Snowspeeder
反乱軍スノースピーダー・パイロット
저항군 스노우스피더 파일럿
Rebel Snowspeeder Pilot Suit
反抗軍雪地戰機駕駛員
反抗軍雪地戰機駕駛員
Rebel Snowspeeder Pilot Suit
kDesc
(Torso/pants/shoes) The flight suit of the fearless Rebel pilots who went head to head with the Imperial army at the great Battle of Hoth.[#Legal]
(Torse/pantalon/chaussures) La combinaison de vol des intrépides pilotes rebelles qui ont affronté l'armée Impériale lors de la grande Bataille de Hoth.[#Legal]
(Oberkörper/Hose/Schuhe) Der Fliegeranzug des furchtlosen Rebellenpiloten, der in der großen Schlacht von Hoth der imperialen Armee die Stirn bot.[#Legal]
(Torso/pantaloni/scarpe) Il costume da volo degli impavidi piloti dei Ribelli che hanno combattuto testa a testa contro l'esercito imperiale nella grande Battaglia di Hoth. [#Legal]
(Torso/pantalones/zapatos) El traje de vuelo de los intrépidos pilotos rebeldes que se enfrentaron con el ejército imperial en la Gran Batalla de Hoth.[#Legal]
ホスの戦いにおいて帝国軍と対峙した、恐れを知らぬ反乱軍パイロットの飛行スーツ。[#Legal]
호스 대전투에서 제국 군대와 맞서 싸운 용감한 저항군 파일럿의 비행복.[#Legal]
(Torso/pants/shoes) The flight suit of the fearless Rebel pilots who went head to head with the Imperial army at the great Battle of Hoth.[#Legal]
反抗軍駕駛員飛行裝，英勇的駕駛員身著此裝在霍斯戰役中對抗帝國軍。[#Legal]
反抗軍駕駛員飛行裝，英勇的駕駛員身著此裝在霍斯戰役中對抗帝國軍。[#Legal]
(Torso/pants/shoes) The flight suit of the fearless Rebel pilots who went head to head with the Imperial army at the great Battle of Hoth.[#Legal]
